summary: Diff updates InteractivePage to show only Gallery and Gift cards in a 2-column grid and removes LetterModal usage there. GiftModal is reworked to display the love-letter style message with romantic typography and structured letter formatting while preserving the roses bouquet image; Tailwind/CSS are extended to support a romantic font and letter styling.

hallucinated_features.description: Gift modal appears to add an explicit “Back” UI control (ArrowLeft/Button) beyond the requested typography/content move.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requested removing the Letter experience and moving/styling the letter content within the Gift modal; it did not request adding additional navigation controls inside the Gift modal.
evidence: frontend/src/components/GiftModal.tsx (imports ArrowLeft and Button; file summary mentions a "Back" button)
